mapper.select: SELECT C.board_name, C.created_at, CASE WHEN C.user_id = NULL THEN B.aca_name WHEN C.aca_id = NULL THEN A.name ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS `name` FROM `user` A LEFT JOIN academy B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN board C ON B.aca_id = C.aca_id OR A.user_id = C.user_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
